project_descr: Strengthening national capacity for enforcement of environment standards and effective management of natural resources as well as management of climate change

outputs.output_descr: The main objective of the project is to facilitate the coordination of climate change and development of the climate change strategy

The project outputs include: 
1. Forest policy/legal framework reviews to create enabling environment for implementation of reducing emissions from deforestration and forest  degradation (REDD)
2. Climate change response strategy, policy and legal framework
3. Capacity developed for waste management as potential resources for development of Clean Development Mechanism (CDM) projects 
4. Early warning system streghened

Comprehensive and effective system for production and delivery of early warning services, tailored to serve climate change adaptation formulated through the institutional strengthening and system development; capacity developed for integration of climate change adaptation in early warning services; climate change adaptation concerns disseminated through cross-sectoral sensitization and capacity building on the relevance of early warning for adaptation.

document_name: Strategic Review of the UNREDD Programme - Zambia Quick Start Initiative
